channel.title: How to make a item only for me?

item.title: How to make a item only for me?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

     if (wearId == 773 && [b][size=12pt]![/size][/b]p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("conner")) {
          return;
     }

The [size=12pt]![/size] is an unary operator, which inverts the value of a boolean. So rather than being if username equals connor, its if username does not equal connor.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a item only for me?

item.title: How to make a item only for me?
item.dc:creator: @coder_conner coder conner
item.description:
@coder_conner wrote:

i am coding a 517 server and i was wondering how to make it so i can only wear a item? i have this is equipment.java under some donator only stuff (note im not getting a error when i compile)
if (wearId == 773 && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“conner”)) {

	return;
		}

and that makes it so other ppl can wear it but i cant.
does any body know how to fix this?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a item only for me?
